sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO QnA(qseq, prodnum, u_id, title, content, indate) values(qna_seqm.nextval, #prodnum#, #u_id#, #title#, #content#, #indate#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT qseq, prodnum, u_id, title, content, reply, rep, TO_CHAR( indate, 'yy-mm-dd')as indate FROM QnA ORDER BY qseq DESC
SELECT qna.qseq, qna.prodnum, qna.u_id, qna.title, qna.content, qna.rep, qna.indate, product.name FROM QnA INNER JOIN product ON qna.prodnum = product.prodnum WHERE qseq = #qseq#
